newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil's Kandir presents privatization bond plan.
newsitem.headline: Brazil's Kandir presents privatization bond plan.

text.p: Brazilian Planning Minister Antonio Kandir will present at Tuesday's meeting of the National Privatization Council his plans to convert six billion reais of government debt owed to a workers fund into privatization bonds.

A ministry spokeswoman said a bill, allowing all workers in the formal economy to use credits with the Time Served Guarantee Fund (FGTS) to buy shares in upcoming privatizations, needs approval from the council and the fund's guardians before being sent to Congress.
The meeting was also due to discuss the inclusion of power generator Furnas in Brazil's privatization program and the minimum prices for concessions to run four ports.
